alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott; Stoddard; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 11:46AM CDT until July 18 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Union County in southern Illinois... Jackson County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Alexander County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Bollinger County in southeastern Missouri... Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Perry County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Missouri... Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... Northern Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1145 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Perryville to near Marble Hill to near Shook, moving east, southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cape Girardeau, Carbondale, Jackson, Murphysboro, Scott City, Chaffee, Bloomfield, Advance, Oran, Benton, Trail Of Tears State Park, De Soto, Cobden, Puxico, Morley, Ava, Grand Tower, Kelso, Bell City and Delta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bollinger; Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott; Stoddard; Wayne
